data.quote: Knowing you’re different is only the beginning. If you accept these differences you’ll be able to get past them and grow even closer
data.author: Miss Kobayashi

data.quote: You can’t always hold on to the things that are important. By letting them go we gain something else.
data.author: Kunio Yaobi

data.quote: If you wanna make people dream, you’ve gotta start by believing in that dream yourself!
data.author: Seiya Kanie

data.quote: It may be hard right now, but you must silence those thoughts. Stop counting only those things that you have lost. What is gone, is gone.
data.author: Jinbei

data.quote: Don’t give up, there’s no shame in falling down! The true shame is to not stand up again!
data.author: Shintaro Midorima

data.quote: Even If you’ve only got a 1% chance of winning, but you convince yourself you’re gonna lose, that 1% becomes 0%
data.author: Lina Inverse
